column5: Raised as a Methodist;[18] denomination: EPC.[19]
Swore by an old Heilige Bibel, a family Bible.[24]
Denomination: NBC.[28] Raised as a Methodist.[29]
Denomination: BGC; attends a non-denominational church.[38]
Denomination: SBC; former student ministries and evangelism specialist for the BGCO.
Former associated pastor of Abyssinian Baptist Church, affiliated to NBC; senior pastor of Ebenezer Baptist Church, affiliated to PNBC and ABC.
Raised on the periphery of the Episcopal Church, but misidentified as an Episcopalian in the Pew Report.
His wife, former Rep. Gabby Giffords, is Jewish.
Raised in both Jewish and Christian traditions.[175]
